page.title: St. Mary the Virgin Church, Uttoxeter

'''The Parish Church Of Saint Mary The Virgin''' commonly referred to as '''St. Mary's''' by locals, is the parish church for the town of [[Uttoxeter]]. The Present structure dates from 1877 however the spire dates from the 15th century and the church is Grade II* [[Listed building|Listed]].<ref name="IoE">{{cite web|title= Parish Church Of St Mary, Bridge Street|url=http://www.imagesofengland.org.uk/Details/default.aspx?pid=2&id=272896|publisher=National Monuments record|year=2010|accessdate=30 August 2010}}</ref> This is one of two Anglican churches within the parish, the other is also St Mary's but is commonly called 'The Heath Church' to avoid confusion.
'''The Parish Church Of Saint Mary The Virgin''' commonly referred to as '''St. Mary's''' by locals, is the parish church for the town of [[Uttoxeter]]. The Present structure dates from 1877 however the spire dates from the 15th century and the church is Grade II* [[Listed building|Listed]].<ref name="IoE">{{cite web|title= Parish Church Of St Mary, Bridge Street|url=http://www.imagesofengland.org.uk/Details/default.aspx?pid=2&id=272896|publisher=National Monuments record|year=2010|accessdate=30 August 2010}}</ref> This is one of two Anglican churches within the parish, the other is also St Mary's but is commonly called 'The Heath Church' to avoid confusion.
